<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>aisa_rp_config</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete AI Search Assist RP Variable</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var utils = new global.AISARecordProducerUtils();
function deleteFunc(gr) { if (utils.removeFromRecordProducer(gr)) gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("The AI Search Assist variable has been removed from the '{0}' Record Producer", current.sc_cat_item.name)); }
if (current.operation() == "delete") { deleteFunc(current); } else if (current.operation() == "update" && current.sc_cat_item.changes()) { deleteFunc(previous); utils.addToRecordProducer(current); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-08-27 23:01:39</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>2102574377b210108c8e3036971061bd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete AI Search Assist RP Variable</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="AI Search Assist" source="com.snc.ai_search_assist">20ab7c643c35311068bcf327dfe37f3f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_2102574377b210108c8e3036971061bd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-08-28 03:22:44</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2102574377b210108c8e3036971061bd"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Delete AI Search Assist RP Variable
